title: Black Screen after game finishes (so I have to hard reboot computer)
body:
Dear Riot,

I've been experiencing this issue in the past few days.

After a game (ranked solo) finishes, instead of going to the score board and chat, I have my screen black.
I can hear the sound effect of players enter/leave the score board chat so the computer is running "fine".
I can even launch windows programs through hotkey.
But the screen keeps totally black and I can not see anything no matter what I do.
I have to forcefully reboot my computer after every single game.
This is really annoying.

It happens quite consistently.

I tried to repair my installation and it worked for a morning (two games).
But after I'm back from lunch and wake my computer from sleep, I run into the same issue again.

replies.body: I have the same exact issue, it just started recently in the 6.24 patch so I am not sure where to even start at.

It sounds like this may be an issue with your display driver or a windows power setting. I'd strongly recommend going through the steps in our [**Framerate troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure all your driver is up to date and that League can properly access your display hardware.

Please let me know if this issue persisted through those steps.
